trans-unit.target: TEXT_GAIUSC809_01033_SEQ_00<tab>Nortmoen would like to enlist your help in order to boost his troops' morale.
TEXT_GAIUSC809_01033_SEQ_01<tab>Wanting to boost his troops' morale, Nortmoen asks that you bring back scintillating sea wasp umbrellas.
TEXT_GAIUSC809_01033_SEQ_02<tab>You have procured the requested number of sea wasp umbrellas. Deliver them to Nortmoen.
TEXT_GAIUSC809_01033_SEQ_03<tab>Nortmoen grows uncharacteristically giddy at the sight of the umbrellas, reveling in schadenfreude at the thought of his brother's potential jealousy.
TEXT_GAIUSC809_01033_TODO_00<tab>Slay sea wasps and obtain their umbrellas.
TEXT_GAIUSC809_01033_TODO_01<tab>Deliver the sea wasp umbrellas to Nortmoen.
TEXT_GAIUSC809_01033_NORTMOEN_000_000<tab>If you'd care to help our cause, I'd petition you to hunt down some sea wasps and bring their umbrellas for us to eat.
TEXT_GAIUSC809_01033_NORTMOEN_000_001<tab>Our worst enemy atop these walls is sinking morale, and a true taste of Limsa helps remind us what we're fighting for.
TEXT_GAIUSC809_01033_NORTMOEN_000_010<tab>I imagine you've come bearing my sea wasp umbrellas...unless you've turned coat and given them to my brother, that is.
TEXT_GAIUSC809_01033_NORTMOEN_000_021<tab>Haha! Splendid! Tonight we will feast on the jellyfish while my jealous fish of a brother drinks in his tears! It will be glorious!
